title: Stencil / Stamp Font: Serif and Distressed
content:
Need some help identifying this font. It looks kinda like Stencil Antiqua but it has the distress cut marks. Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bones.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714170820/http:/typophile.com/files/bones.jpg) | 39.98 KB |
author: huhn76

comments.content:
It's close to Inkpad, but not quite it. Check out the top of the "A", it has a unique serif. Anyone have any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714170820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DAG_4221.jpg)

Yes, just like Inkpad.  
Did you even check the glyphs shown on the page Jodie linked to?
Oops, that is it, sorry! Thank you for your help defiantone! And thank you Jan for your snarky help as well! Seriously thank you very much!
